Requirements¶

Baruwa requirements¶

  • Python >= 2.4
  • Django >= 1.1.1
  • MySQLdb >= 1.2.1p2
  • GeoIP
  • iPy
  • Any Web server that can run Django (Apache/mod_wsgi recommended)
  • MySQL
  • Sphinx (Optional - to build documentation)

MailScanner requirements¶

  • DBI
  • DBD-MySQL
